name: VR Slots 3D
description: Try for free the first VR Slots in the world. Incredible gaming machines in one application. Start playing now and get free coins every day.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD analogue Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1050 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD analogue Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
